H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H4912.def: = an utterance, often in poetic style, that has a specific message, such as an oracle, words of advice, wisdom, or mockery

H8010.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► king of Judah and {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; given the name {L:Jedidiah<SDBH:יְדִידְיָהּ>} at his birth

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H6275.def: = process by which rocks move spontaneously from one place to another

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H2396.def: = man, also known as {L:Jehizkiah<SDBH:יְחִזְקִיָּה>}; ◄ son of {L:Ahaz<SDBH:אָחָז>}; ► father of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}; king of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

101.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H3519.def: = position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H5641.def: = state in which people or objects are in a location where they cannot be readily seen or where danger cannot reach them

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H2713.def: = action by which someone tries to obtain information about a certain object, person, or event by examining it carefully

H8064.def: = the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H3820.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H2714.def: = action by which someone makes an effort to obtain information about events

H1898.def: = causative action by which humans causes other humans or objects to be removed from their place,◄ as if by blowing them away

H3701.def: = silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

H3627.def: = human-made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes

H6884.def: = action by which humans or deities examine the character of humans by having them engage in a certain activity, ◄ as a goldsmith tests the quality of a precious metal by smelting it in the fire

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H1898.def: = causative action by which humans causes other humans or objects to be removed from their place,◄ as if by blowing them away

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H3678.def: = large elaborate seat used by people in a position of authority or wealth

H3559.def: = state in which an object is firmly and immovably located in a certain place

H6664.def: = state in which a weight or measure is correct or accurate, in accordance with a standard

H1921.def: = action by which humans gives other humans a preferential treatment over other people

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H5975.def: = process by which humans, deities, animals, or inanimate objects take position in a certain location in an upright position

H4725.def: = a specific area or point in space

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H5081.def: = state in which humans are willing to perform a certain task and show that by their actions

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H7200.def: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily --though not necessarily exclusively-- with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H7378.def: = action by which humans initiate a possible argument or conflict with other humans or with a deity by accusing them of wrongdoing or by taking action in a different way

H4100.def: = a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H319.def: = pertaining to being located far behind other objects in a row, in a direction away from the spectator; ≈ since the way the ancient Israelites oriented themselves was with their backs facing the East, this term presupposes a westerly direction

H7453.def: = the non-verbal sounds made by a large group of people in response to a situation, either positively or negatively

H3637.def: = state in which humans experience a feeling of shame, as a result of their own actions or because of what other have done

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H7379.def: = state of opposition or hostility between two or more persons, perhaps even involving a deity

H7378.def: = action by which humans initiate a possible argument or conflict with other humans or with a deity by accusing them of wrongdoing or by taking action in a different way

H7453.def: = the non-verbal sounds made by a large group of people in response to a situation, either positively or negatively

H1540.def: = action by which someone takes off his/her clothes, either entirely or in part, ► as a result of which that person becomes naked or improperly dressed, ≈ which is considered a shameful thing to do

H312.def: = pertaining to being different from other objects and events that are in the same range

H5475.def: = a group or gathering of persons (like friends or members of the same group) or heavenly beings

H1681.def: = action by which humans give a verbal report concerning circumstances or events, usually with evil intentions

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H655.def: = point in time that is the most appropriate for a certain activity

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H8598.def: = a tree that reaches a height of 5-10 meters; it has a rounded crown, and bears a round fruit about the size of an orange; in the spring the tree is completely covered with pink flowers, which gradually give way to the green of the leaves as they develop; the fruit can be greenish, yellow, or red. ◄ Malus sylvestris; ► considered both beautiful and refreshing

H2091.def: = metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity

H4906.def: = a physical likeness or representation of a person, animal, or thing; ◄ carved out of stone, ► and functioning as an object of non-sanctioned worship

H3701.def: = silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

H5141.def: = ring; ◄ made out of silver or gold; ► worn for personal adornment, either in the ear or in the nose

H2091.def: = metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity

H2481.def: = object made by an artist; ◄ made out of a precious metal, with or without precious stones; ► worn for personal adornment; ≈ regarded as valuable and beautiful

H2450.def: = state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency

H3198.def: = action by which someone with judicial authority settles a dispute between two parties

H241.def: = one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used for hearing; also a common place to wear jewelry

H6793.def: = state in which the temperature of the atmosphere is relatively low

H7950.def: = frozen crystallized water vapor in the form of very white flakes which fall as precipitation from the sky and cover the ground during freezing cold weather; as soon as the temperature rises above freezing, it melts and becomes water; ≈ associated with cold, whiteness, or purity

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H539.def: = state in which an inanimate object is firmly positioned in its place, so that it will not move

H6735.def: = a physical likeness or representation of a person, animal, or thing in the form of an image or a drawing; ► functioning in non-sanctioned rituals or as an object of non-sanctioned worship

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H5315.def: = the part of the body connecting the head to the rest of the body and containing the passageways for blood, air, and food; ≈ associated with breathing, appetite, and life and often used metonymically to refer to the entire body and the personality inhabiting it

H113.def: = man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer

H5387.def: = someone in a position of high authority in a clan, tribe, or nation

H7307.def: = an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H1653.def: = water that has fallen as rain

H1984.def: = process by which an object emits or reflects light; ≈ regarded as awesome

H8267.def: = state in which humans are not committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions

H753.def: = the greater or greatest of two or more dimensions of an object

H639.def: = the two external openings in the nose

H7101.def: = a person who is acknowledged by a group as having authority over them ► to provide leadership, often in battle, and justice

H7390.def: literally: soft of heart; hence: = state in which humans lack courage and decisiveness

H3956.def: = the fleshy organ in the mouth, used for tasting, licking, swallowing, and (in the case of humans) speaking

H1634.def: = any of the pieces of hard, whitish tissue that together constitute the skeleton of humans and animals; ≈ associated with strength

H4672.def: = process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for

H1706.def: = sweet substance ◄ made either by bees, or from fruits such as dates, grapes or figs; ► much appreciated as food; ≈ associated with abundance and fertility

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H1767.def: = state of being sufficient in quantity for a given purpose

H7646.def: = process by which someone's desire for food is fulfilled

H6958.def: = action by which humans or animals empty their stomachs of its contents; ◄ after having eaten too much, having ingested contaminated food, or due to sickness or excessive alcohol consumption

H3365.def: = state in which humans are valuable and worthy of respect in the eyes of others

H7272.def: = the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and --by extension-- of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H7453.def: = the non-verbal sounds made by a large group of people in response to a situation, either positively or negatively

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H7646.def: = process by which someone's desire for food is fulfilled

H8130.def: = state in which humans or deities experience hostility towards a person, an object, or a practice

14.gl: to have enough (of someone or something)

H4650.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = a short wooden rod used for striking the enemy in hand-to-hand combat; it could be held with one hand and was used to strike the enemy on all parts of his body, particularly where he was unprotected by armor; possibly fitted with a heavy head made of stone or metal

H2719.def: = sharp object; ◄ made out of iron or flint; ► used as tool for various purposes

H2671.def: = pointed missile, shot from a bow; slender and straight in shape and moving swiftly; ◄ made out of wood and/or iron; ► mainly used for hunting, in warfare, and occasionally for divination; ≈ symbol of aggression, affliction, and punishment

H6030.def: = action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions

H8267.def: = state in which humans are not committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions

H5707.def: = a person or deity who has evidence that something has taken place or that some decision has been made

H7453.def: = the non-verbal sounds made by a large group of people in response to a situation, either positively or negatively

H7465.def: = action by which animals are feeding on grass and other edible materials in the field, ≈ often extended to denote the way a king cares for his subjects or the way God cares for his people

H7272.def: = the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and --by extension-- of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H4571.def: = causative action by which deities cause the loins of humans shake

H4009.def: = state in which humans live with confidence and without fear; ≈ often regarded as carelessness, especially when there is no mention of trust in YHWH

H898.def: = pattern of behavior by which humans act in a way which shows a lack of truthfulness and commitment, both in words and deeds

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H6869.def: = a process by which humans go through extremely difficult circumstances, resulting in severe anxiety, ◄ as if one were confined to a narrow and cramped space from which there is no escape

H899.def: = piece of cloth used to cover an object

H7135.def: = referring to a state of low temperature

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H2558.def: = sour alcoholic liquid; ◄ by-product of {L:grape wine<SDBH:יַיִן>} and {L:date-wine<SDBH:שֵׁכָר>}, due to acetous fermentation when it has been in contact with open air longer than necessary; ► used in diluted form as dip for bread, but to be avoided by Nazirites because of the alcohol; very unpleasant when it comes in contact with (bad) teeth and open wounds

H5427.def: = sodium carbonate ► used as a dye, medicament, and cleansing agent (AYBC)

H7891.def: = action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not

H3820.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H8130.def: = state in which humans or deities experience hostility towards a person, an object, or a practice

H7457.def: = condition of not having food to eat, often leading to weakness

H3899.def: = a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H6771.def: = state in which someone senses a feeling of needing or wanting to drink, ► which eventually leads to weakness or even death; ≈ also used in a figurative sense to denote a longing or desire

H4325.def: = water as the indispensible liquid on which the existence of all life depends, used for drinking, preparing food, washing, irrigating, etc.; found under the earth, on the earth, and above the earth; sometimes used as a euphemism to denote certain body liquids; ≈ associated with abundance and refreshment, but also with instability, and danger, etc.

H8248.def: = state in which objects contain a certain amount of moisture

H2846.def: = causative action by which humans take small objects from a particular location with an object shaped like a shovel ► in order to transfer them to another location

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H6828.def: = a mountain, identified with Jebel ʾel-Aqraʿ ◄ in northern Syria, ► known by the Canaanites as the mountain of the gods

H7307.def: = an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)

H2342.def: = action by which humans delay action until the right moment, with a certain amount of confidence that this moment will actually come

H1653.def: = water that has fallen as rain

H3956.def: = the fleshy organ in the mouth, used for tasting, licking, swallowing, and (in the case of humans) speaking

H2194.def: = action by which deities or humans give free expression to their anger regarding someone else

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H6438.def: = a place or angle where two or more sides or edges meet

H1406.def: = the structure forming the upper covering of a building, usually built as a terrace, to which one goes up by stairs

H2267.def: = state of being associated with other people for a common purpose

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H4066.def: = state of opposition or hostility between two or more persons

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H7119.def: = state in which water has a relatively low temperature

H4325.def: = water as the indispensible liquid on which the existence of all life depends, used for drinking, preparing food, washing, irrigating, etc.; found under the earth, on the earth, and above the earth; sometimes used as a euphemism to denote certain body liquids; ≈ associated with abundance and refreshment, but also with instability, and danger, etc.

H5315.def: = the part of the body connecting the head to the rest of the body and containing the passageways for blood, air, and food; ≈ associated with breathing, appetite, and life and often used metonymically to refer to the entire body and the personality inhabiting it

H4801.def: = state in which humans, deities, objects, or events are located in a place that is at a relatively great distance from the point of reference

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H7515.def: = action by which animals tread heavily and noisily on objects, ► resulting in destruction

H4599.def: = an opening in the earth that gives access to the subterranean water which either comes to the surface or can be drawn from it; ≈ its water is regarded as a source of blessing

H7843.def: = process by which objects are affected by violence, destruction, putrefaction, pollution, blemishes, and other factors that may have a destructive impact

H4726.def: = an opening in the earth that gives access to the subterranean water which either comes to the surface or can be drawn from it; ≈ its water is regarded as a source of life and well-being

H6662.def: = state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior

H4131.def: = state in which an object is not firmly fixed to the surface on which it stands so that it can move or slip; to waver

H7563.def: = state in which a person's behavior is inconsistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H2714.def: = action by which someone makes an effort to obtain information about events

H3519.def: = position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H2346.def: = structure surrounding a building, a collection of buildings, or a town; ◄ made out of stone; ► provides protection; ≈ associated with strength, safety, and the ability to resist attacks from outside

H6555.def: = process by which a container bursts open due to abundance of contents

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H4623.def: = action by which humans keep themselves from engaging in certain activities

H7307.def: = an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)
